name: role-context-manager
description: Manage role-based document context for Claude Code sessions. Set your role, customize document references, and automatically load relevant context based on your organizational level.
author: Software Organization Template

commands.name: set-role
commands.description: Set your current role (software-engineer, product-manager, etc.)

commands.name: show-role-context
commands.description: Display current role and documents that will load

commands.name: update-role-docs
commands.description: Add (+) or remove (-) documents from your role's reference list

commands.name: init-role-docs
commands.description: Initialize or reset role document references to defaults
